mainEntity.name: Can I use the Yuva theme for multiple Shopify stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, the Yuva theme license is valid for use on only one Shopify store per purchase. If you operate multiple stores, you will need to purchase separate licenses for each store to stay compliant with Shopify's theme licensing policies.

mainEntity.name: Does the Yuva theme support Shopify's Online Store 2.0 features?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the Yuva theme is fully compatible with Shopify's Online Store 2.0. It offers modular sections, flexible content blocks, and better control over theme customization, providing enhanced flexibility for merchants who want to design their stores with Shopify's latest features.

mainEntity.name: How can I troubleshoot coding issues with the Yuva theme?

acceptedAnswer.text: If you encounter coding issues with the Yuva theme, you can access support through the theme's support service. Additionally, Shopify provides theme file editing access within the dashboard, where you can troubleshoot or apply fixes. Always ensure you back up your theme files before making any changes.
